meanings.sent1: I will rerent the car for another week.
meanings.sent2: After returning the DVD, I decided to rerent it for movie night.
meanings.sent3: The library allowed me to rerent the book even though it was overdue.
meanings.sent4: She decided to rerent the beach house for the summer, creating new memories.
meanings.sent5: I rerented the bicycle and explored the city at my own pace.

meanings.sent1: The rerent of the apartment was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: We had to negotiate the rerent of the office space for another year.
meanings.sent3: The rerent of the equipment saved us money on the project.
meanings.sent4: His rerent of the same tuxedo for every event became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The rerent of the venue for the wedding made the couple's dream come true.
